content.text: Hey, I'm doing alright. How are you?
I'm good! I'm excited to go shopping and test drive my new car.
That sounds like fun! I love shopping. I'm always bumping into things because I'm always thinking about my favorite super hero.
That's funny! What's your favorite super hero?
My favorite super hero is Superman. He's strong, brave, and always there to help people.
Those are all great qualities. I like him too. He's a good role model.
Yeah, he is. I'm a disappointment to my family, but I hope to be more like Superman one day.
I'm sure you'll be a great role model for your family one day. You seem like a good person.
No problem! What do you do for fun?
I like to spend time with my family and our dog. We love going outdoors and playing sports.
That sounds like fun. I love playing sports too. I'm a barista, and I love my job.
That's cool! I would love to learn more about sports nutrition so I can help my son improve his game.
I'm sure you would be a great sports nutritionist.
